TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit VerificationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class VerificationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class VerificationAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义 Web 内容可访问性规则的元数据特性。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute of a Web content accessibility rule.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例类定义可验证的 Web 内容可访问性规则。An instance of the class defines a Web content accessibility rule that can be verified. Web 内容辅助功能准则的详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on Web Content Accessibility Guidelines, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 若要定义的实例所需信息的最少工作量包括：The minimal amount of information required to define an instance of a includes: - 表示验证规则的准则。A guideline that the verification rule represents. 构造函数设置中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 准则的检查点。A checkpoint of the guideline. 构造函数设置中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 检查点优先级。A checkpoint priority. 构造函数设置中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 一个枚举值，表示应为规则的报告级别属于。A enumeration value that represents the reporting level that should be rule belongs to. 构造函数设置中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 验证规则为 true 时，会报告一条消息。A message that is reported when the verification rule is true. 构造函数设置中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. 可在创建实例时指定的验证规则的可选属性：Optional properties of the verification rule that can be specified when creating an instance: - 一个枚举值，表示应如何解释的验证规则。A enumeration value that represents how the verification rule should be interpreted. 构造函数设置中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 一个枚举值，表示用来测试验证规则的条件表达式中的运算符。A enumeration value that represents the operator in the conditional expression used to test the verification rule. 构造函数设置中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 辅助功能引用准则 URL。An accessibility reference guideline URL. 构造函数设置中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 一个表示条件表达式的右侧的条件值。A conditional value representing the right side of a conditional expression. 构造函数设置中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 表示左侧和右侧的条件表达式的条件属性。A conditional property representing the left side of a conditional expression. 构造函数设置中指定的值属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. 元数据可以是定义的类、 属性和索引器声明。The metadata can be defined class, property, and indexer declarations. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates using the class. 在验证元数据定义中，所采用的原则是"WCAG，"Web 内容可访问性准则和"ADA，"美国人残障人士 Act 指导原则。In the verification metadata definition, the guidelines used are "WCAG," the Web Content Accessibility Guideline, and "ADA," Americans with Disabilities Act Guidelines. 有关详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 使用检查点分别，为"1.1"和"1194.22(a)"WCAG 和 ADA 非文本元素的等效文本已存在用于确保检查点。The checkpoints used are "1.1" and "1194.22(a)" for WCAG and ADA, respectively, checkpoints for ensuring that a text equivalent exists for non-text elements. 应用于`ImageText`表示另一个属性的文本等效项的属性，称为`ImageProperty`。The is applied to the `ImageText` property that represents the text equivalent of another property called `ImageProperty`. 如果`ImageText`未设置属性，可访问性验证会返回消息"该映像缺少等效文本。"If the `ImageText` property is not set, the accessibility verification will return the message "The image is missing a text equivalent." [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute/cs/VerificationAttributeExample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute/vb/VerificationAttributeExample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的构造函数类指定定义验证规则所需的信息的最少工作量。The constructor of the class specifies the minimal amount of information needed to define a verification rule. 以下默认值为假定实例：The following default values for the instance are assumed: - 属性设置为。The property is set as . - 属性设置为。The property is set as . - 属性设置为空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 属性设置为空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 属性设置为空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 若要指定属性的值超出其默认值为前面列表中，使用或构造函数重载。To specify values of the properties in the preceding list beyond their default values, use the or constructor overloads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `conditionalProperty`参数是作为条件表达式的一部分用于评估的验证规则的另一个属性。The `conditionalProperty` parameter is another property that is used as part of the conditional expression to evaluate the verification rule. 例如，如果规则参数是，然后指定的相关的属性`conditionalProperty`必须不能为空字符串 ("")。For example, if the rule parameter is then the related property specified by `conditionalProperty` must not be an empty string (""). 以下默认值为假定实例：The following default values for the instance are assumed: - 属性设置为。The property is set as . - 属性设置为空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 属性设置为空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). 若要指定属性的值超出其默认值为前面列表中，使用构造函数重载。To specify values of the properties in the preceding list beyond their default values, use the constructor overload.

summary.span: 获取指定的 属性中的可访问性检查点引用。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时设置属性创建实例，并是必需的。The property is set when the instance is created and is required. Web 内容辅助功能准则定义上[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)属性指定为检查点号后跟一个句点 （.） 后的指导原则数字。For the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines defined on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) the property is specified as a guideline number followed by a period (.) followed by a checkpoint number.

summary.span: 获取用作验证可访问性检查点的一部分的条件表达式的左侧。

span.span: Gets the left side of a conditional expression used as part of the verification accessibility checkpoint.

The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性时可以设置实例创建后，但是可选的。The property can be set when the instance is created, but is optional. 如果使用构造函数不采用`conditionalProperty`参数，默认值为空字符串 ("") 使用。If you use a constructor that does not take a `conditionalProperty` parameter, the default value of an empty string ("") is used. 属性是右侧或值，是在可访问性检查点的验证中使用的条件表达式。The property is the right side, or value, of a conditional expression that is use in the verification of the accessibility checkpoint. 使用指定的条件表达式的左侧。The left side of the conditional expression is specified with the .

summary.span: 获取用于可访问性检查的准则。

span.span: Gets the guideline that used for accessibility checking.
A string representing the guideline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时设置属性创建实例，并是必需的。The property is set when the instance is created and is required. 指导原则的示例包括"WCAG 1.1"和"ADA508"。Examples of guidelines include "WCAG 1.1" and "ADA508".

summary.span: 获取 URL，该 URL 可用于获取有关 属性中给定的可访问性准则的更多信息。

span.span: Gets the URL the can be used to get more information on the accessibility guidelines given in the property.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性时可以设置实例创建后，但是可选的。The property can be set when the instance is created, but is optional. 如果使用构造函数不采用`guidelineUrl`参数，默认值为空字符串 ("") 使用。If you use a constructor that does not take a `guidelineUrl` parameter, the default value of an empty string ("") is used. 输入的字符串属性不会检查是否正确。The string entered for the property is not checked for correctness.
